; IR for module: hello.world

IrModule {
    name: "hello.world",
    version: "0.1.0",
    imports: [],
    types: [
        IrTypeDef {
            name: "name",
            ty: Str,
        },
    ],
    functions: [
        IrFunction {
            name: "greet",
            params: [
                (
                    "name",
                    Named(
                        "name",
                    ),
                ),
            ],
            return_type: Str,
            effects: [
                "pure",
            ],
            body: IrBlock {
                statements: [],
            },
        },
    ],
    exports: [
        "name",
        "greet",
    ],
}
